com.empatica.empalink

Class EmpaDeviceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.empatica.empalink.EmpaDeviceManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class EmpaDeviceManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The EmpaticaDeviceManager is the core class that allows you to interact with Empatica devices. It provides discovery, connection, and disconnection methods.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Creates a new Empatica Device Manager

      Connects to an Empatica device
      void disconnect()
      Disconnects from the currently active Empatica device

      Returns the currently active device, i.e., the device this Manager is connected to

        • authenticateWithAPIKey

          public void authenticateWithAPIKey(java.lang.String key)
          Authenticates this Device Manager with the Empatica Backend. An Internet connection is required. If you don't have a key, please contact Empatica
          Parameters:
          key -

                   throws ConnectionNotAllowedException
          Connects to an Empatica device
          Parameters:
          device - the Empatica device you want to connect to
          Throws:
